description: The warmest down jacket for shiver-free belays on ice and alpine routes, après-trek at Everest Base Camp, and light-and-fast pushes in the high mountains that inspired Mountain Hardwear's existence: The Phantom™ Jacket provides high-lofting, packable warmth with increased durability for an all-around jacket that shines on light-and-fast alpine pushes. Wherever belays, bivies, and bone-chilling temps are guaranteed, make sure the Phantom™ is within reach.
name: Mountain Hardwear Phantom Down Jacket - Mens
